project_plan.name: Fetch Current Weather Information in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API and display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., `requests`)
Implement a function to call the weather API and fetch data for a given city
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a function to display the fetched weather information in a user-friendly format
Write tests for the functions implemented above to ensure data is fetched and displayed correctly
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
